```{r setup,echo=F,message=F,warning=F,error=F,include=F}
# Install and load pacman (library management package)
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")

# Install and load required packages from CRAN ---------------------------------
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, here, knitr, DT, fs)

# global knitr chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval = FALSE, echo = FALSE, 
                      warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```  

# Interactive survey map

```{r plot-leaflet-map, echo=F, out.height="8in",out.width="100%", eval=TRUE}
# Load imap
load(here("Output/imap/interactive_explorer.Rdata"))

# Display map
i.map
```

**Figure 1.** An interactive map of the distribution of 38-kHz integrated backscattering coefficients ($s_A$, m^2^ nmi^-2^;  averaged over 2000-m distance intervals) ascribed to CPS (from 5 to 70-m deep) and krill (5 to 350-m deep); CUFES egg density (eggs m^-3^) for anchovy, sardine, and jack mackerel; catch (by weight) of CPS species in trawl clusters (white points); and some other miscellaneous survey data. Hover-over or click on some map objects for more info. 

# Acoustic backscatter
## CPS

```{r plot-backscatter-cps,out.width="100%",eval=T}

```

**Figure 2.** The distribution of 38-kHz integrated backscattering coefficients ($s_A$, m^2^ nmi^-2^;  averaged over 2000-m distance intervals and from 5 to 70-m deep) ascribed to CPS.


# Trawl species proportions  

```{r plot-trawl-proportions,out.width='100%',eval=T}
include_graphics(here("Figs/fig_trawl_species_proportion_wt.png"))
```

**Figure 6.** Proportions of CPS species in trawl clusters, by weight (black points indicate trawl clusters with no CPS).  

\newpage  

# Backscatter, CUFES egg density, and Trawl Species Composition  

```{r plot-combo-maps,out.width='100%',eval=T}
include_graphics(here("Figs/fig_nasc_cufes_trawl.png"))
```

**Figure 7.** A map of the a) distribution of 38-kHz integrated backscattering coefficients ($s_A$, m^2^ nmi^-2^;  averaged over 2000-m distance intervals and from 5 to 70-m deep) ascribed to CPS, b) distribution of 200-kHz integrated backscattering coefficients ($s_A$, m^2^ nmi^-2^;  averaged over 2000-m distance intervals and from 5 to 350-m deep) ascribed to krill, c) CUFES egg density (eggs m^-3^) for anchovy and sardine, and d) proportions of CPS species (by weight) in trawl clusters (black points indicate trawl clusters with no CPS).
